data.eml:eml: Ubristes rex sp. n., a new microdontine hoverfly from northern Brazil (Diptera: Syrphidae: Microdontinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Reemer, Menno (2017): Ubristes rex sp. n., a new microdontine hoverfly from northern Brazil (Diptera: Syrphidae: Microdontinae). Zootaxa 4362 (2), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4362.2.7
